plot: After allowing his girlfriend to die in a Romeo and Juliet suicidal re-enactment, a psychologist begins to experience strange events as he comes to terms with his actions.
title: And Juliet
plot_es: After allowing his girlfriend to die in a Romeo and Juliet suicidal re-enactment, a psychologist begins to experience strange events as he comes to terms with his actions.
plot_en: After allowing his girlfriend to die in a Romeo and Juliet suicidal re-enactment, a psychologist begins to experience strange events as he comes to terms with his actions.
